titleInfo.title: Church of God in Jesus Christ Name service, 2002 April 20

mods.abstract: Video recording of a service officiated by Jimmy Morrow with a small number of attendees. Jason Barnes and his sister lead the congregation in song. Glenn Dukes, who is visiting the congregation, handles first one and then two serpents at a time. Jimmy Morrow preaches in melodic tones, expounding on scripture. During the sermon he begins handling a serpent for a short time. The sermon is following by more hymns and the testimony of Rayford Dunn.

name.namePart: Hood, Ralph W. Williamson, W. Paul (William Paul)
